41.1.why: Begins new experiences only when the container and timing feel right. (weak thematic resonance with lyra)

41.2.why: Resents pressure to start on command; withdraws the spark. (weak thematic resonance with lyra)

41.3.why: Learns correct initiation by surviving a few awkward launches. (weak thematic resonance with lyra)

41.4.why: This is not about artistic expression, creative enchantment, or aesthetic refinement (Lyra core patterns)

41.5.why: Others expect you to launch the next cycle for everyone. (weak thematic resonance with lyra)

41.6.why: This is not about artistic expression, creative enchantment, or aesthetic refinement (Lyra core patterns)
